DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to show the efficacy, tolerance and nutritional adequacy of a newly developed hydrolyzed rice formula in infants with a proven cow's milk protein allergy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy of a New Formula in Infants With Cow's Milk Protein Allergy
DOC.criteria: Infants between 2 weeks and 6 months old In whom cow's Milk Protein Allergy has been proved by a food challenge performed during the previous month Exclusively breast fed infants Preterm infants Infants already fed with an extensively hydrolyzed formula with no improvement of the symptoms. Infants fed an amino acid based formula Infants who had an anaphylactic reaction in the past
